quest.name: Pass the Poacher
journal:
The cock-a-hoop collector awaits you with bated breath.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

The overenthusiastic Au Ra explains the simple activity to you, delivering a Hatching–tide decoration to her hiding counterpart. However, she says you must do so without it getting snatched by any spriggans strolling around the quarter. Pick up one of the egg decorations from the basket to begin.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
You have picked up one of the decorative eggs. Carry it safely to the collector-in-training hiding in Old Gridania, avoiding any spriggans that may cross your path.

Adeptly sneaking past the coddled spriggans, you eventually arrive at the Lalafell's hiding place and deliver the egg decoration to him and he attempts to see you off with some egg humor. Return to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre and report to the cock-a-hoop collector.
The cock-a-hoop collector hands over a fortune egg and welcomes you to challenge again, but not before charming you with more of her eccentric disposition.
objectives: Deliver the decorative egg to the collector-in-training.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA02129
dialogue.text: Hello there, friend! Fancy yourself stealthy enough to outsmart a spriggan? Why not try your hand at Pass the Poacher?

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA02129
dialogue.text: The task is quite simple─it's the eggsecution that is tricky! Beside me is a basket from which you will choose one decoration. Careful not to over-eggsert yourself, though─they are quite heavy!

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA02129
dialogue.text: You will need to deliver it to my compeer, who has hidden himself somewhere in the quarter. However, if you wander too close to one of the coddled spriggans meandering about, the greedy creature will grab the egg right out of your grasp. You will have to return to fetch another.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Deliver the decorative egg to the collector-in-training in Old Gridania.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Beware the spriggans lying in wait. Being caught en route or leaving Old Gridania will result in failure.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will have four minutes to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.

dialogue.name: SPRIGAN
dialogue.text: Big egg! Big shiny eeegg! My biiig shiiiny eeeeeegg!

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFB02129
dialogue.text: I appreciate you coming all this way, but you appear to be empty-handed! Return to my mentor and fetch yourself a festive decoration.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFB02129
dialogue.text: You've found me! The spriggans did not cause you much trouble, did they? You may report back to the egg...uh, egg...enthusiastic lass at the amphitheatre.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFB02129
dialogue.text: Er, eggsemplary work, madamsir! ...Whew, this is not as easy as it looks.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA02129
dialogue.text: My fellow Dreamer told me by linkpearl that you have successfully carried the decoration to him. Well done! Here you are, your prize!

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA02129
dialogue.text: Let me know if you wish to embark on another delivery eggspedition!
